{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD-W8980 |revision=v1 |upc=845973060886 |asin=B00C4OANW0 |newegg=N82E16833704176 |price=114 |est_release_date=04/2013 |fcc_date=09/02/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=common |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=TE7TDW8980V1 |pcb_id=2011500132 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80910;XWAY VRX268, PSB 80910 EL, V1.2; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64FVSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8221;XWAY WAVE300, PSB 8221 EL, V1.1; |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8301;XWAY WAVE300, PSB 8301 V, V1.1; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V;XWAY PHY11G, PEF 7071V, V1.4; |eth_chip3_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip3_model=PEF 7071V;XWAY PHY11G, PEF 7071V, V1.4; |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=DSL (ADSL2+) LD/AFE;Lantiq;PSB 80190;PSB 80190 V, V1.1;1; <!-- XWAY VRX208 --> |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit ADSL2+ Modem Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?model=TD-W8980 Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TD-W8980&version=V1 Downloads] :[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/gpl/GPL_TD-W8980.tar.gz Current GPL source code tarball]
"2011500132", "Rev:1.0" and the ''TP-LINK'' logo is silkscreened on :the board in the FCC photos.. and in the image shown below.
This device is using a [[Lantiq]] PSB 8221 PCI MAC/BB for the 5GHz radio. :The 2.4GHz radio is a separate [[Atheros]] AR9287 PCIe Wi-Fi IC.
Default settings (including SSID formats) are per '''TP-LINK''''s manual. :Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::243 mm x 160.6 mm x 32.5 mm]] <!--per '''TP-LINK''''s product page, are-->
===PSU=== The power adapter shown (FCC photos) is a '''HuntKey''' HKA01812015-2K :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A).
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.hwupgrade.it/forum/archive/index.php/t-2536618.html ''TP-LINK TD-W8980 v1'' on '''HWUpgrade''' forums]
===Vendor links=== *[http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16833704176 On '''Newegg'''] *[http://www.amazon.com/TP-Link-Wireless-ADSL2-Router-TD-W8980/dp/B00C4OANW0 On '''Amazon''']
